description: There are certain girls who inspire me enough to really just be the sadistic fuck that I am. There is a short list, but today that list got a little longer as I add Violet to it. She asked to be totally fucking destroyed, and I like to think of myself as a giver, and don't want to keep anyone from getting what they want. The first position is to see if she was sincere with her request to suffer. Her desires are genuine so I go forward with the plan to wreak havoc on this slut. The brutality that is unleashed on her is something that is not a commonly seen due to most girls can't get marked like this or take this brutality. By the end of the day she has been utterly destroyed by terrorizing torment, made to cum more than she knew she could, and yet she has a smile on her face..that's why she is being added to the list.
title: Getting The Devil Out
